title: [1.7.10-1.3.2][ssp/smp][汉化]UsefulFood(有用的食物)[链接已补]
author: Darkyoooooo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Darkyoooooo 于 2015-7-24 17:46 编辑 

一款添加了许多种既实用又美观的食物的Mod详细介绍:
生物掉落: 生物 掉落物品回复饥饿度 注释          
       Raw Squid Tentacle
             (生鱿鱼须) ·在v1.2中加入
·单只鱿鱼掉落
1-4个生鱿鱼须
·如果鱿鱼死于
火烧 则掉落熟
鱿鱼须          
              Raw Mutton
                 (生羊肉) ·单只羊掉落1个
生羊肉
·如果羊死于火
烧 则掉落熟羊
肉
熔炼公式:
 物品名称 熔炼公式 回复饥饿度 注释 Cheese(奶酪)   可治愈中毒Buff Roasted Marshmallow(烤棉花糖)    Hot Chocolate Bottle(热巧克力)    Fried egg(煮鸡蛋)    Cooked Mutton(烤羊肉)    Cooked Squid Tentacle(烤鱿鱼须)    Roasted Seeds(炒种子)

 糕一致  Apple Cake(苹果蛋糕)  (每片)  Chocolate Cake(巧克力蛋糕)                   (每片)                  Magic Cake(魔法蛋糕)

更新记录:
v1.4.4
Added: Support for MrCrayFish Oven (i think its kinda OP atm, but i guess he will change it eventually)Added: Support for languages, check in zip\assets\usefulfood\lang, if you want official support for your language, just pm me your .lang fileFixed: Chocolate Biscuits now requires 2 biscuits and hot chocolate bottleFixed: Nerfed Oreo A LOT from 19 to 9Fixed: Hungrz item now drains food points when held instead of emptying it by right-clickRenames:Cooked Squid Tentacle > CalamariTea > Lily Tea

v1.4.3
Added: CerealAdded: Chocolate CerealAdded: Apple & Melon JellyAdded: French FriesAdded: Pancake DoughAdded: Apple & Melon JamAdded: Pancakes for all the jam's, sugar, caramel and chocolate.Added: Donut & OreoAdded: Toasts (All the jam's, Sugar, Caramel and Chocolate)Changed: Vanilla Ice Cream now needs Milk BottleChanged: Fish n' Chips now uses French Fries instead of Baked PotatoChanged: All Ice Creams now cures poisonChanged: Cheese reduced hungerpoints by 1Removed: Dungeon loot, this feature never seems to iron out, i could extend the loot tables but that allow for way too much loot if having a ton of other mods and causes issues with that..

replies.author: c91297285
replies.txt_content: 我很丧心病狂的把有用食物和更多食物一起加入MODS 把所有冲突的合成给试了一遍结果既然没有崩溃,还合成出来的既然是更多食物里的... 什么情况给个解释...

replies.author: Darkyoooooo
replies.txt_content:
c91297285 发表于 2013-11-26 15:11 
我很丧心病狂的把有用食物和更多食物一起加入MODS 把所有冲突的合成给试了一遍结果既然没有崩溃,还合成出来 ...
Forge检测到有合成冲突就会禁用若干个mod的这个合成公式 只保留一个mod的这个合成公式

replies.author: c91297285
replies.txt_content:
Darkyoooooo 发表于 2013-11-26 17:50 
Forge检测到有合成冲突就会禁用若干个mod的这个合成公式 只保留一个mod的这个合成公式
原来是这样 感谢答复!

replies.author: dycdyc1007
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 dycdyc1007 于 2016-4-14 08:34 编辑 

去原帖看了，网站上这个mod的子页面没有了，难道弃坑？

还有一点，发现食物类模组真的是相当容易造成合成冲突的，尤其以：
1.糖合成块状
2.烹饪牛奶
3.加工腐肉
4.鸡蛋
有没有什么解决办法？虽然知道版上有个“合成冲突消除”mod，但是对于熔炉是无效的
